channel.title: tdd on Dirk Groot
channel.description: Recent content in tdd on Dirk Groot

item.title: Robot Worlds 2: Communication
item.description: <summary> Our walking skeleton is no more than an undead skull at the moment. Some more bones need to be added to make it a fully fledged skeleton. Let’s see if we can set up communication between the client and the server. </summary>

item.title: Robot Worlds 1: Walking Skeleton
item.description: <summary> Let’s make a game! I have a big graveyard of unfinished hobby projects, so I have no idea how far I’ll get. But as long as learning ensues, I’m fine with that. </summary>
